CopyJob.SimpleFileConditions:
saadc\\*: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.defmak$$ == NRF52 comp\\*: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.defmak$$ == NRF52 i2s\\*: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.defmak$$ == NRF52 pdm\\*: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.defmak$$ == NRF52 pwm\\*: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.defmak$$ == NRF52 twis_slave\\*: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.defmak$$ == NRF52 swi\\*: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.swi_driver$$ == yes spi_master\\spi_5W_master..: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.spi_driver$$ == 5W_master spi_slave\\nrf_drv_spis..: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.spi_driver$$ == slave uart\\.*: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.uart_driver$$ == yes spi_master\\nrf_drv_spi..: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.spi_driver$$ == master
<--> spi_master\\spi_5W_master..: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.spi_driver$$ == 5W_master
nrf_soc_nosd\\*: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.softdevice$$ == nosoftdev .*\\twi_hw_master.c: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.twi_driver$$ == hw_master .*\\twi_sw_master.c: $$com.sysprogs.bspoptions.nrf5x.twi_driver$$ == sw_master

PropertyEntry.Name: Fixed stack size
PropertyEntry.Description: Specifies the amount of memory (in bytes) to reserve for the stack

PropertyEntry.Name: Fixed heap size
PropertyEntry.Description: Specifies the amount of memory (in bytes) to use for dynamically allocated data
